metadata.title: CVE-2014-5008 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Snoopy allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5008` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libphp-snoopy - 2.0.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libphp-snoopy package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.0-1').
